question: Tyler has 90 square yards of raspberry field. There are 82 raspberrys per square yard. Tyler can harvest his raspberrys every 3 months. How many raspberrys can Tyler harvest within a year?
answer:
Tyler has 82*90= <<82*90=7380>>7380 raspberrys on his field.
Tyler can harvest his raspberrys 12 / 3 = <<12/3=4>>4 times per year
Therefore Tyler can harvest 7380*4 = <<7380*4=29,520>>29,520 raspberrys per year.
#### 29,520
